response.job_title: Estudiante en Universidad Nacional de Colombia

company.name: Hexagon Data – a NATEEVO Company
company.description:
Hexagon Data is a leading Customer Data Strategy firm in LATIN AMERICA.

With offices in Mexico and Bogota, we focus on helping Companies reach their Audiences and Consumers at the right channel at the right moment. Opportune contact means better communication, less noise, and optimized spend.
We believe that in order to deliver a remarkable customer experience, a company must first take the necessary steps to properly understand its customers, their preferences and behaviors.

Technology, however, becomes effective only with proper strategy: Data acquisition, management, activation and monetization require a framework that is aligned with the Company strategy, Marketing KPI’s and available resources. We help companies navigate these mostly unknown waters with a group of strategic and technical consultants that work hand in hand with our customer's in-house teams during the acquisition, implementation and day to day use of their Marketing Cloud Stack, to help maximize their business results.

Vendors we work with: Salesforce, Adobe, Oracle, Google and others
info@hexagondata.io
